glsa.title: RealPlayer: Buffer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: RealPlayer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow that could lead to remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: RealPlayer is a multimedia player capable of handling multiple multimedia file formats.

description.p: RealPlayer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow when processing malicious SWF files.

impact.p: By enticing a user to open a specially crafted SWF file an attacker could execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All RealPlayer users should upgrade to the latest version:
